response.original_title: Sesame Street: Elmo's World: Elmo Explores
response.overview: What is Elmo exploring today? In this bright and lively update of Elmo's World, Elmo explores 13 topics with his new friend, Smartie the smart phone, and his old pal, Mr. Noodle. Preschoolers will love to learn along with Elmo! Learn all about: * Painting * Cooking * Homes * Habitats * Father's Day * Skin * Camouflage * Recycling * Instruments * Books * Seasons * Siblings * Colors
response.title: Sesame Street: Elmo's World: Elmo Explores
